entry.title: Standard Abrasives STA-830070 - Aluminum Oxide Buff & Blend Hp Roll 830070 4 in x 30 Ft A Very Fine 220 Aluminum Oxide 7000046754
entry.summary:
Vendor: Standard Abrasives
Type: Buffs
Price: 108.95

[shortdesc]

3M Standard Abrasives A/O Buff and Blend HP Roll, 830070, 4 in x 30 ft, A VFN 220 A/O

  • 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ A/O Buff and Blend HP Roll 830070 is an excellent choice for a variety of applications
  • Great for edge deburring on aluminum extrusions, deburring aluminum die cast flashing, radius edges on precision machined and contoured parts and removing micro burrs
  • It removes heavy surface oxidation and surface coatings for part inspection, and is great for removing rust
  • Rolls are also cut to size and used by hand or to finish a part turning on a lathe or spindle.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand Standard Abrasives
    Line Standard Abrasives
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Buffs

    Product Information

  • Edge deburring on aluminum extrusions
  • deburring aluminum die cast flashing, radius edges on precision machined parts, and contoured parts
  • removing micro burrs
  • Removing heavy surface oxidation and surface coatings for part inspection
  • surface preparation prior to coating
  • removing rust
  • Blending mill marks, tool marks, mismatches, and coated abrasive disc scratch patterns
  • reducing uneven edges
  • Providing a matte finish on aluminum and steel enclosures
  • satin finish on large stainless steel surfaces
  • Waterproof
  • may be used with lubricants
  • Resists loading
  • no metal contamination to work piece

    • Suggested Application

  • Removing large and micro burrs, edge radiusing, removing die cast flashings
  • Blending mill marks, tool marks, mismatches, scratch patterns
  • Removing coatings, gaskets and surface discolourations from welds or other work surfaces
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: Standard Abrasives
Type: Buffs
Price: 6.84

[shortdesc]

3M Standard Abrasives Buff and Blend HS Disc, 860706, 6 in x 1/2 in A CRS A/O

  • 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ Buff and Blend HS Disc 860706 is made from tough, resin-reinforced nylon fiber with abrasive grain
  • Its high strength makes it the best material for light deburring and finishing applications
  • It blends minor surface imperfections, handling marks and coated abrasives secondary burrs
  • The center hole discs may be ganged on a shaft and used as a wheel
  • It resists loading, which means no metal contamination to the work piece.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand Standard Abrasives
    Line Standard Abrasives
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Buffs

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ Buff and Blend HS Disc 860706 is made from tough, resin-reinforced nylon fiber with abrasive grain
  • Its high strength makes it the best material for light deburring and finishing applications
  • It blends minor surface imperfections,

    • Product Information

  • Blends minor surface imperfections, handling marks, coated abrasives secondary burrs
  • Helps to remove minor surface oxidation, coatings and rust
  • surface preparation prior to coating
  • Helps to remove part lines from small castings, small burrs from threaded pipes, flash from plastic molded parts
  • Grain finishing on stainless steel after weld removal, cosmetic finishing on aluminum castings
  • Resists loading
  • no metal contamination to the work piece
  • Cool running
  • Long life

    • Suggested Application

  • Ferrous materials, non-ferrous materials, aluminum, high nickel/chrome alloys, stainless steel, builders hardware
